intro.title: My Approach:
intro.text:
Hello, I'm David, I have experience building efficient solutions, maintaining critical systems in production. I like working practically, solving real problems, and adding real value within teams.

One of my favorite hobbies is creating tools and solutions that make my day-to-day easier, always learning something new in the process. In the professional field, I value teamwork, continuous learning, and being part of a company that accompanies my personal and professional development goals.
